text: is a Japanese comedy shōnen manga series written and illustrated by Mitsurō Kubo. It was serialized in 2011 in Weekly Shōnen Magazine published by Kodansha until reaching its conclusion in 2014. It was adapted into a Japanese television drama series in the summer of 2014, running from 21 July to 22 September. ==References== Category:2014 Japanese television series debuts Category:High school television series Category:Japanese television dramas based on manga Category:Time travel television series
title: Again! (manga)
